name: SafariSettings
desc: Constraints on Safari’s AutoFill and cookie behaviors.

items.name: var cookiePolicy: SafariSettings.CookiePolicy?
items.desc: Defines the conditions under which Safari accepts cookies.

items.name: static let cookiePolicy: SettingMetadata<SafariSettings.CookiePolicy>
items.desc: The metadata for the setting that configures Safari’s policy for cookies.

items.name: enum CookiePolicy
items.desc: The conditions under which Safari accepts cookies.

items.name: var denyAutoFill: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether Safari’s AutoFill feature is active.

items.name: static let denyAutoFill: SettingMetadata<Bool>
items.desc: The metadata associated with the setting that deactivates Safari’s AutoFill feature.
